We are seeking a highly motivated Frontend Developer to join our Bangalore team.
The ideal candidate will have strong experience in building responsive web applications using React.js, Redux, and modern CSS frameworks like Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap.
Knowledge of RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and version control using Git/GitHub is required.
Familiarity with TypeScript and Node.js is a plus.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain web applications with high-quality code
- Collaborate with designers and backend developers
- Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
- Participate in code reviews and maintain best practices

Location: Bangalore (Hybrid)
Experience: 1-3 years
Interested candidates, please send your resume to hr@stellartech.io with the subject line 'Application for Frontend Developer' hr email: abhignajonnalagadda2580@gmail.com.
